content.heading: Launch to BSC MainNet
content.text: Initial launch to BSC MainNet will take place on April 9th 2021.

content.heading: Multiple Audits
content.text: Audits will be applied for & completed by several well-known auditing groups and individuals.

content.heading: CoinGecko & CoinMarketCap
content.text: Multiple Listing services including but not limited to, CoinGecko & CoinMarketCap will be applied for.

content.heading: Release iOS and Android App
content.text: Launch of iOS and Android app enabling all to Save Planet Earth.

content.heading: Carbon Sequestration
content.text: Participate in planting trees, nurseries, recycling, municipal solid waste, treating plastics & tires, & many other climate combating projects.

content.heading: Partnerships with Mystery Nation-States
content.text: Partnership with specific countries viz., Indonesia, Hawaii, Seychelles, Maldives, and even in African states such as CÃ´te d'Ivoire, Senegal, Togo so on, and also including Alaska and some North American coastal-areas, to bring in lasting solutions to fight climate change, rising sea levels and other environmental perils.

content.heading: HODL Rewards
content.text: Recycling/Energy from Waste, and carbon abatement revenues to be disbursed amongst holders!

content.heading: Strategic Connections
content.text: Coordinate with crucial entities in the recycling industry involving use of metal and other components that can potential cause pollution; for example potential cadmium and heavy metal intoxication from metals so on need to be strategically planned out so that climate change solutions themselves un-thoughtfully instituted will not bear additional burdens in the fight against Global climate Change.

content.heading: Major Exchange Listing
content.text: Apply for multiple major centralized exchanges.

content.heading: Minting of original NFTs
content.text: Commissioning known artists for pro-bono carbon neutral/negative NFT auctions supporting non-profits.

content.heading: Widespread Global Adoption
content.text: Partner with non-profits, nation-states, & world-renowned entities that are active in averting waste pile-ups and combating climate change.

content.heading: Offset Incentives
content.text: Companies & individuals can offset their carbon footprint by donating to plant trees and recieve a Carbon Neutral/Negative Virtual NFT certificate!

content.heading: GPS Monitoring
content.text: See on a live map inside the SPE iOS or Android app where your trees have been planted along with all trees that have been planted by the community!

content.heading: Futures Trading
content.text: Futures trading mechanism implemented in the renewable energy sector to tackle waste, pollution, and use of resource materials that will inevitably give rise to unwelcome (new) pollution steams, for example solar cells at end of their services lives can easily give rise to the buildup of cadmium and other toxins in the soil, a process that has to be supported by a discerning futures trading.
